comment.author: 신덕현
comment.content: Can anyone give me the answer why the content is not displayed the way it should be?

post.content:
Late Breaking News






It was announced today that Canada is now prepared to help
the US in its war against terrorism. They have promised to commit 2 of their
largest battleships, 6000 armed troops and 60 fighter jets..........




However, after the exchange rate, that comes down to a canoe, 2 Mounties and a flying squirrel.
post.title: Late Breaking News
